snippet: Robert F. X. Sillerman made the concert business more corporate and wants to do the same with the latest trend in the music industry.
abstract: Media executive Robert F X Sillerman is pursuing a strategy to transform electronic dance music the way he transformed the concert industry; hopes to combine independent, regional promoters of dance festivals, DJ parties and other events into a single umbrella organization under the SFX Entertainment brand.
lead_paragraph: Robert F. X. Sillerman made the concert business more corporate and wants to do the same with the latest trend in the music industry.

headline.seo: Mogul to Increase Bets on Electronic Dance Music
headline.main: A Concert Mogul Is Betting on Electronic Dance Music
headline.print_headline: A Concert Mogul Is Betting On Electronic Dance Music
